title: Council Decision of 29 March 1996 on the replacement of certain members and alternate members of the European Social Fund Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 29 March  1996
on the replacement of certain members and alternate members of the European Social Fund  Committee
(96/C  113/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and altenate members of  the European Social Fund Committee for the remainder of their current term of office, which runs  until 22 October 1998:
I.  Government representatives
(a)
>TABLE>
(b)
>TABLE>
II.  Employers'  representatives
(a)
>TABLE>
(b)
>TABLE>
This Decision shall be  published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 March 1996.
For the Council
The President
T. TREU
(1) OJ No L 374, 31. 12. 1988, p. 1.
(2) OJ No C 296, 10. 11. 1995, p. 7.
